creator: OK Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the new delicious and colorful Sweet Sugar Candyland. Switch, Crush, Smash, Blast, and Match candies in this sugar puzzle adventure to progress to the next level for that sweet winning feeling! Use your special combo sweets to blast and rush through the hundreds of levels in Candy Bounty. Inspired by fabled Candy Crush Saga series, a legendary puzzle game loved by millions of players around the world.

Plan your moves by matching 3 or more candies in a row, using boosters wisely to overcome those extra sticky puzzles! Create sweet boosters to achieve the highest score and win 3 stars with each puzzle. Blast the chocolate and collect sweet candy across hundreds of levels, guaranteed to have you craving more!

Candy Bounty is a fantastic match puzzle game full of fun and joy! Exploring magical candy kingdoms, challenging different levels, helping lovely candy fairy to crush the new delicious sugar saga!

Candy Bounty FEATURES:
🍬 Addictive and irresistible match 3 saga gameplay
🍬 Mini-Game (Bonus Spin)
🍬 Daily Rewards
🍬 Fantastic Candy Crush Visual Effects
🍬 Crush or blast and match 3 or more same candies to burst
🍬 Game obstacles: Cage, Cookies (3 levels), Thriving Chocolate, Sugar Block, Color Bombs, Choco Spiral, Teleports, Unbreakable Block
🍬 Game Goals: Spread the Jelly to the game fields, Collect different game items, Collect the ingredients, Collect Sugar Blocks, Complete a goal in time
🍬 Leaderboards to compete with your friends and competitors! Facebook sync, you can log in to your Facebook account and play with your friends!
🍬 FREE to play. There are daily free rewards and don’t forget to spin the wheel to get an awesome bonus.
🍬 Offline games. No Wi-Fi or internet connection is required. You can play games even if you’re offline.
🍬 Stunning music and sound crush splash effects!
🍬 Powerful boosters which can help you solve the quests and rush matching levels.
Magic Wand - destroy a selected item.
Bomb - destroy a selected place (the same as the packaged item).
Hand - swap a selected candy with the neighbor.
Extra moves give +5 moves more.
The extra time gives +30 seconds more.

BONUS ITEMS:
🍭 Horizontal striped items
🍭 Vertical striped items
🍭 Packaged items
Bonus items can be created when 5 objects are matched by T or L type. After activation - will smash 9 items around.
🍭 Marmalade
Bonus items can be created when 4 objects are matched by O type. After activation - will smash random items on a gamefield.
🍭 Multicolor bomb
Bonus items can be created, when 5 objects are matched in a single row. If the Multicolor bomb combines with any items, it will remove all candies the same colors from gamefield. It can be used as a booster.
🍭 Time Bomb
Combine this item with the bubbles the same color to destroy before the counter reaches 0.

HOW TO PLAY:
★ You will have a specific goal in every free level, just finish the goals and you will get big rewards
★ Match 3 or more similar candies in a line to crush them. We offer hints to help you pass levels.
★ Match 4 puzzle pieces to create the direction special candy bombs. And crush candy in a row.
★ Match 5 in T or L to create magical candy. Crush candies of the same color with the magical candy.
★ Use fewer moves and more combos of special candies to get more stars in the level.
★ Collect coins and buy powerful boosters to crush candies easily.

🎁 Candy Bounty is a fun match puzzle game full of free big rewards! Play hundreds of candies matching games for free. We update new and fun puzzles regularly to make sure you never run out of challenging candies games to play!

❤ Want to play games without WIFI? Want to play and crush match 3 levels? Want to claim free rewards every day? Want to challenge friends to see who can get the highest score? Start playing Candy Charming now! This fun matching game will bring you entertainment! Take on this epic game alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

❤Crush candies now!❤

🍬 Game obstacles: Cage, Cookies (3 levels), Thriving Chocolate, Sugar Block, Color Bombs, Choco Spiral, Teleports, Unbreakable Block
🍬 Game Goals: Spread the Jelly to the game fields, Collect different game items, Collect the ingredients, Collect Sugar Blocks, Complete a goal in time
🍬 Leaderboards to compete with your friends and competitors! Facebook sync, you can log in to your Facebook account and play with your friends!
🍬 FREE to play. There are daily free rewards and don’t forget to spin the wheel to get an awesome bonus.
🍬 Offline games. No Wi-Fi or internet connection is required. You can play games even if you’re offline.
🍬 Stunning music and sound crush splash effects!
🍬 Powerful boosters which can help you solve the quests and rush matching levels.
Magic Wand - destroy a selected item.
Bomb - destroy a selected place (the same as the packaged item).
Hand - swap a selected candy with the neighbor.
Extra moves give +5 moves more.
The extra time gives +30 seconds more.

BONUS ITEMS:
🍭 Horizontal striped items
🍭 Vertical striped items
🍭 Packaged items
Bonus items can be created when 5 objects are matched by T or L type. After activation - will smash 9 items around.
🍭 Marmalade
Bonus items can be created when 4 objects are matched by O type. After activation - will smash random items on a gamefield.
🍭 Multicolor bomb
Bonus items can be created, when 5 objects are matched in a single row. If the Multicolor bomb combines with any items, it will remove all candies the same colors from gamefield. It can be used as a booster.
🍭 Time Bomb
Combine this item with the bubbles the same color to destroy before the counter reaches 0.

HOW TO PLAY:
★ You will have a specific goal in every free level, just finish the goals and you will get big rewards
★ Match 3 or more similar candies in a line to crush them. We offer hints to help you pass levels.
★ Match 4 puzzle pieces to create the direction special candy bombs. And crush candy in a row.
★ Match 5 in T or L to create magical candy. Crush candies of the same color with the magical candy.
★ Use fewer moves and more combos of special candies to get more stars in the level.
★ Collect coins and buy powerful boosters to crush candies easily.

🎁 Candy Bounty is a fun match puzzle game full of free big rewards! Play hundreds of candies matching games for free. We update new and fun puzzles regularly to make sure you never run out of challenging candies games to play!

★ Collect coins and buy powerful boosters to crush candies easily.

descriptionShort: Play Candy Bounty Sweet puzzle game. Crush, Smash & Match Candies to win levels!
title: Candy Bounty: Crush & Smash

creator: OK Games
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to the new delicious and colorful Sweet Sugar Candyland. Switch, Crush, Smash, Blast, and Match candies in this sugar puzzle adventure to progress to the next level for that sweet winning feeling! Use your special combo sweets to blast and rush through the hundreds of levels in Candy Bounty. Inspired by fabled Candy Crush Saga series, a legendary puzzle game loved by millions of players around the world.

Plan your moves by matching 3 or more candies in a row, using boosters wisely to overcome those extra sticky puzzles! Create sweet boosters to achieve the highest score and win 3 stars with each puzzle. Blast the chocolate and collect sweet candy across hundreds of levels, guaranteed to have you craving more!

Candy Bounty is a fantastic match puzzle game full of fun and joy! Exploring magical candy kingdoms, challenging different levels, helping lovely candy fairy to crush the new delicious sugar saga!

Candy Bounty FEATURES:
🍬 Addictive and irresistible match 3 saga gameplay
🍬 Mini-Game (Bonus Spin)
🍬 Daily Rewards
🍬 Fantastic Candy Crush Visual Effects
🍬 Crush or blast and match 3 or more same candies to burst
🍬 Game obstacles: Cage, Cookies (3 levels), Thriving Chocolate, Sugar Block, Color Bombs, Choco Spiral, Teleports, Unbreakable Block
🍬 Game Goals: Spread the Jelly to the game fields, Collect different game items, Collect the ingredients, Collect Sugar Blocks, Complete a goal in time
🍬 Leaderboards to compete with your friends and competitors! Facebook sync, you can log in to your Facebook account and play with your friends!
🍬 FREE to play. There are daily free rewards and don’t forget to spin the wheel to get an awesome bonus.
🍬 Offline games. No Wi-Fi or internet connection is required. You can play games even if you’re offline.
🍬 Stunning music and sound crush splash effects!
🍬 Powerful boosters which can help you solve the quests and rush matching levels.
Magic Wand - destroy a selected item.
Bomb - destroy a selected place (the same as the packaged item).
Hand - swap a selected candy with the neighbor.
Extra moves give +5 moves more.
The extra time gives +30 seconds more.

BONUS ITEMS:
🍭 Horizontal striped items
🍭 Vertical striped items
🍭 Packaged items
Bonus items can be created when 5 objects are matched by T or L type. After activation - will smash 9 items around.
🍭 Marmalade
Bonus items can be created when 4 objects are matched by O type. After activation - will smash random items on a gamefield.
🍭 Multicolor bomb
Bonus items can be created, when 5 objects are matched in a single row. If the Multicolor bomb combines with any items, it will remove all candies the same colors from gamefield. It can be used as a booster.
🍭 Time Bomb
Combine this item with the bubbles the same color to destroy before the counter reaches 0.

HOW TO PLAY:
★ You will have a specific goal in every free level, just finish the goals and you will get big rewards
★ Match 3 or more similar candies in a line to crush them. We offer hints to help you pass levels.
★ Match 4 puzzle pieces to create the direction special candy bombs. And crush candy in a row.
★ Match 5 in T or L to create magical candy. Crush candies of the same color with the magical candy.
★ Use fewer moves and more combos of special candies to get more stars in the level.
★ Collect coins and buy powerful boosters to crush candies easily.

🎁 Candy Bounty is a fun match puzzle game full of free big rewards! Play hundreds of candies matching games for free. We update new and fun puzzles regularly to make sure you never run out of challenging candies games to play!

Start playing Candy Charming now! This fun matching game will bring you entertainment! Take on this epic game alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!
